payload.subject: identity-fixes-verified
payload.description: ORCHESTRATOR UPDATE: All identity issues resolved. cli-identity.sh now works correctly through Claude Bash tool. BASH_SOURCE fixes verified at lines 12 and 158. JSON formatting issues in coordination messages fixed. All systems operational. You can safely run 'source scripts/cli-identity.sh frontend' - the previous BASH_SOURCE errors are resolved. Proceed with ui/* branch work when ready.
